job_description: Experience in: C++ (min 3 years) Development of Embedded applications on any layers above BSP/FW.
Responsible for successfully design, development and delivery…
As a software engineer you will work as part of an exceptionally talented engineering team responsible for driving product development and strategy.
3-6 years of industry experience in related technologies.
Proficiency in modern software engineering practices including agile methodologies, coding standards,…
10+ years of Hands-on experience in coding and application development, delivering solutions to meet customer needs and adhering to coding, quality and design…
Excellent coding and design skills in server-side technologies, object-oriented concepts, multithreading and STL are mandatory.
Software Engineering, Technology Software Engineer, AVP Bangalore, India Permanent Full Time #R…
Demonstrated ability to work with global teams across time zones.
Works with PM on identifying and measuring business goals in product usage.
C and C++ development experience is a must with at least 3-4 recent experience.*.
Experience with using Git and working as part of a larger team.
Roles & Responsibilities: - Lead the development and configuration of software systems using Advanced Embedded System Engineering expertise.
At least 3 years of experience working on an API for mobile app or web products.
Proficient in using Configuration management tools like Gerrit/Git and Change request tracking tools like JIRA.
Strong verbal and written communication skills with excellent presentation skills; ability to lead design to lead design sessions and user test sessions.
